name: Bayonet
effects: As a Melee weapon, deals 4CD Piercing 1 Physical damage

name: Bracketed Short Barrel
effects: Allows the weapon to take a Muzzle mod

name: Bracketed Long Barrel
effects: Allows the weapon to take a Muzzle mod

name: Shredder (Minigun)
effects: As a Melee weapon, deals Physical damage equal to Fire Rate (CD)

name: Targeting Computer (Missile Launcher)
effects: When you Aim at a target, the target does not benefit from being in cover, and the bonus for aiming applies to the next attack on any subsequent turn during the scene

name: Bayonet (Missile Launcher)
effects: As a Melee weapon, deals 4CD Piercing 1 Physical damage

name: Curved Blade (Ripper)
effects: On successful attack, spend 2 AP to disarm opponent, knocking one held weapon away

name: Hooked (Pipe Wrench)
effects: On successful attack, spend 2 AP to disarm opponent, knocking one held weapon away

name: Extra Claw (Deathclaw Gauntlet)
effects: On successful attack, spend 2 AP to disarm opponent, knocking one held weapon away

name: Large Bayonet (Gatling Gun)
effects: As a Melee weapon, deals 5 CD Piercing 1 Physical damage

name: Turbo (Auto-Axe)
effects: Each AP spent for extra damage adds +2CD instead of +1CD.
